content.title:
Admin panel is the base of every project, the instrument for all client’s needs.
Very ambitious, interesting and complex enough work.

content: Our main goal was to simplify interaction with the admin panel, increase the speed of work on projects, and, of course, attract new customers with a convenient site administration system.

The main strategy is to redesign the admin panel and add new features. We started with the development of already implemented functions, worked through the user experience based on feedback and A / B testing.

Many of our customers come to us with the goal of developing an online store with their products, and this section is very important in the admin panel. It was important to ensure a clear hierarchy of products and their editing, as well as convenient and clear sorting.

We have created a library of components. So, among users there is a factory for the production of concrete products with complex drawings and calculations of products, and a manufacturer of hygiene products with a small set of characteristics.

A set of components and a text editor have also been created for editing content pages. Content is disassembled into small parts that were originally conceived in the design of the project — text, images, galleries, tables, lists and quotes.

Content is very easy to manage using drag-and-drop technology, without violating the overall specified style of the project. One of the innovations of this version of the admin panel is the ability to view preview pages.
